label: BMA250 Driver
name: BMA250
author: Anaren Inc.
description:
The BMA250 is an advanced, ultra-small, triaxial, low-g acceleration sensor with digital interfaces, aiming for low-power consumer electronics applications. Featuring 10 bit digital resolution,
the BMA250 allows low-noise measurement of accelerations in 3 perpendicular axes.
On top, theBMA250 with its 2 x 2 mm² footprint integrates a multitude of features that facilitate its use
especially in the area of motion detection applications, such as device orientation detection, gaming, HMI and menu browser control. Featuring a full operation current consumption of only 130 µA
 the BMA250 is ideally suited for mobile consumer electronic devices.
